channel.title: PI Configs?
channel.description:
Alright, so a lot of things in runescape have configs. Like farm patches, the bank pins, and oh so much more.
But, how do I make them?
For instance, I make a button that has an enabled/disabled state. How would I send a config to the client telling it to switch [Yes, I know it's sendFrame36]. This would help me because then I can apply the same thing to text and I have clickable text that I want to have an enabled/disabled state.

item.title: PI Configs?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

A packet with the information of whether it’s enabled or disabled, and what ever else you need

Read full topic
